docs.text: Juniper documentation ¶ Welcome to the docs! Editing documentation ¶ The docs content all lives under docs/ , with some top-level configuration for how the docs website gets built under mkdocs.yml . To add new sections/articles, simply create new directories/files under docs/ in Markdown format. To preview the rendered docs website live while you work, run script/docs-server from your terminal (requires Python 3.5+). Changes to docs will be published to the online docs website automatically after they are merged into the main branch.
